content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Structure Overview
The target image shows two distinct structures:
1. A small vehicle/train-like structure on the left
2. A tower-like structure on the right with what appears to be a small house

## Block Count and Layers
The structure consists of approximately 17-18 total blocks divided as follows:

### Left Structure (Vehicle/Train):
- Bottom layer: 2 orange cylindrical wheels (horizontal)
- Middle layer: 1 yellow rectangular block (horizontal)
- Top layer: 3 blocks (green rectangular block, blue cube, red block with yellow semi-cylindrical roof)

### Right Structure (Tower):
- Base: 2 orange cylindrical pillars (vertical)
- Second layer: 1 yellow rectangular block (horizontal)
- Third layer: Red house-like structure with an arch doorway and yellow semi-cylindrical roof section
- Vertical element: 1 tall orange cylindrical column
- Top: 1 orange triangular pyramid

## Spatial Relationships
- The left structure resembles a small train or vehicle with wheels at the bottom
- The right structure is taller with vertical supports and what looks like a small house with a doorway
- The tall orange column rises from behind the house structure to support the triangular roof piece

# Block Selection from Dictionary

Based on the main image, I need the following blocks:

1. For the left structure (train):
   - Two orange horizontal cylinders (index 9) for wheels
   - One yellow horizontal rectangular block (index 7) for base
   - One green rectangular block (index 5)
   - One blue cube (index 2)
   - One red block with arch (index 1)
   - One yellow semi-cylindrical roof (index 10)

2. For the right structure (tower):
   - Two orange vertical cylinders (index 8) for pillars
   - One yellow horizontal rectangular block (index 7) for support
   - One red block with arch (index 1) for house structure
   - One yellow semi-cylindrical roof (index 10)
   - One tall orange vertical cylinder (index 8) for column
   - One orange triangular pyramid (index 13 or 14 or 15 or 16, depending on orientation - appears to be index 13)

# Assembly Order

```
{
   Step1: Move block with index 9 (orange horizontal cylinder for left wheel)
   Step2: Move block with index 9 (orange horizontal cylinder for right wheel)
   Step3: Move block with index 7 (yellow horizontal block for train base)
   Step4: Move block with index 5 (green rectangular block for train)
   Step5: Move block with index 2 (blue cube for train)
   Step6: Move block with index 1 (red arch block for train)
   Step7: Move block with index 10 (yellow semi-cylindrical roof for train)
   Step8: Move block with index 8 (orange vertical cylinder for left tower pillar)
   Step9: Move block with index 8 (orange vertical cylinder for right tower pillar)
   Step10: Move block with index 7 (yellow horizontal block for tower support)
   Step11: Move block with index 1 (red arch block for tower house)
   Step12: Move block with index 10 (yellow semi-cylindrical roof for tower house)
   Step13: Move block with index 8 (orange vertical cylinder for tall column)
   Step14: Move block with index 13 (orange triangular pyramid for top)
}
```
